rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {IAR2601, OHS1000}
Must be enrolled in course version {2126%, 2136%, F3001%}

description: This unit will build on previous units and introduce students to the professional practices employed as part of the construction and fabrication of inhabited environments.  Conventions for documentation of project proposals, and communication with other building industry professionals will form important elements of the unit.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
